activeColor.description: The color of the active part of the progress bar
activeColor.description_zh: 进度条激活部分的颜色

inactiveColor.description: The background color of the progress bar, which is gray by default
inactiveColor.description_zh: 进度条的底色，默认为灰色

showText.description: Whether or not to display the value of the percentage inside the progress bar
showText.description_zh: 是否在进度条内部显示百分比的值

height.description: The height of the progress bar, default unit px
height.description_zh: 进度条的高度，默认单位px

slots.name: default
slots.description: Passing in a custom display will override the default display percentage value
slots.description_zh: 传入自定义的显示内容，将会覆盖默认显示的百分比值
